# The `SaveAndRestore` Struct Template Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

A utility class that uses RAII to save and restore the value of a variable. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>template &lt;typename T&gt;
struct llvm::SaveAndRestore&lt;T&gt;</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

A utility class that uses RAII to save and restore the value of a variable.
